item.title: MIUI OS1.0.4.0.UKAEUXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 11 Ultra EEA

Codename: star

Version: OS1.0.4.0.UKAEUXM | 14.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: 18c3d1a748efcd516da26e890a291bf4

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.4.0.UKACNXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China

Codename: star

Version: OS1.0.4.0.UKACNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 54c206723246d937fd661ce0312fb934

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Clock]
Fix: Alarm couldn't be turned off using buttons after it rang
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Gallery]
Optimization: Improved video synchronization strategy to enhance playback smoothness
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery took too long to load when a large number of images were generated in a short period
Fix: Photo timestamps were lost during cloud sync, causing incorrect dates
Fix: Deleted photos reappeared after being removed during cloud synchronization
Fix: Memories couldn't be played on some device models
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery displayed abnormally when capturing a large number of photos consecutively
[File Manager]
Optimization: Loading speed of the file list
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimization score calculation rules to improve accuracy

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Pro / Ultra China

Codename: star

Version: V13.0.10.0.SKACNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.6 GB

MD5: ccc25df1dc51a9964a6598246f3dd1d7

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Issues with the search bar while switching from landscape to portrait orientation
Fix: Carrier names weren't displayed correctly after being edited
Fix: Amap and other similar apps turned off portable hotspot
Fix: Multiple popups appeared while some Bluetooth earphones were being connected
Fix: Problems with NetEase Music lyrics
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2022. Increased system security.

Download: Here
